original_text: He and his people were very much alarmed at this, because Gibeon was an important city, like one of the royal cities; it was larger than Ai, and all its men were good fighters.
korean_text: 크게 두려워하였으니 이는 기브온은 왕도와 같은 큰 성임이요 아이보다 크고 그 사람들은 다 강함이라

sentences.original_text: He and his people were very much alarmed at this
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 백성들은 이 일로 크게 두려워했다

sentences.original_text: because Gibeon was an important city
like one of the royal cities
and all its men were good fighters
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 도시의 모든 남자들은 훌륭한 전사들이었다
